com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Deleteable, OnDestroyListener, OnPauseListener, OnResumeListener, OnStopListener

    public final class Player
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component, OnPauseListener, OnResumeListener, OnDestroyListener, OnStopListener, Deleteable
    Multimedia component that plays audio and optionally vibrates. It is built on top of android.media.MediaPlayer.
    Author:
    halabelson@google.com (Hal Abelson)

    • Method Detail

      • Source

        public java.lang.String Source()
        Returns the path to the audio source

      • Source

        public void Source(java.lang.String path)
        Sets the audio source.

        See MediaUtil.determineMediaSource(com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.Form, java.lang.String) for information about what a path can be.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to the audio source

      • requestPermanentFocus

        private void requestPermanentFocus()
        This method relies on FroyoUtil as Focus is only available on API Level 8

      • IsPlaying

        public boolean IsPlaying()
        Reports whether the media is playing.

      • Loop

        public boolean Loop()
        Reports whether the playing should loop.

      • Loop

        public void Loop(boolean shouldLoop)
        Sets the looping property to true or false.
        Parameters:
        shouldLoop - determines if the playing should loop

      • Volume

        public void Volume(int vol)
        Sets the volume property to a number between 0 and 100.
        Parameters:
        vol - the desired volume level

      • PlayOnlyInForeground

        public boolean PlayOnlyInForeground()
        Gets the policy whether playing should only work in foreground.
        Returns:
        playOnlyInForeground

      • PlayOnlyInForeground

        public void PlayOnlyInForeground(boolean shouldForeground)
        Sets the property PlayOnlyInForeground to true or false.
        Parameters:
        shouldForeground - determines whether plays only in foreground or always.

      • Start

        public void Start()
        Plays the media. If it was previously paused, the playing is resumed. If it was previously stopped, it starts from the beginning.

      • Pause

        public void Pause()
        Suspends playing the media if it is playing.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses when leaving the screen or losing focus. Public so that in can be called from FroyoUtil

      • Stop

        public void Stop()
        Stops playing the media and seeks to the beginning of the song.

      • abandonFocus

        This method relies on FroyoUtil as Focus is only available on API Level 8
